about_the_game:
A MASSIVE voice pack of recorded voice files for young protagonist characters voiced by Alec Shea! Over 330 files including efforts, emotes and phrases with various takes and variations.

Includes:

Light Attack x12
Heavy Attack x11
Warcry x6
Dodge x12
Get Hit x17
Death x16
Jump x12
Climbing x5
Ledge Up x10
Worn Out/Heavy Breathing x4
Emotes:

Big Laugh x6
Small Laugh x8
Surprised x11
Sad x8
Considering x7
Confused x9
Tired x7
Sleepy x5
Angry x11
Apathetic x9
Phrases (x3 each):

1. I got this!
2. Take this!
3. Bring it on!
4. I won’t give up!
5. Let’s go!
6. Battle, start!
7. Mission, start!
8. Alright!
9. Yes!
10. Let’s finish this!
11. Leave it to me!
12. I won’t let you get away with this!
13. Oh no!
14. How could it end like this…
15. I wasn’t strong enough…
16. I gave it my all…
17. My fight ends here…
18. Forgive me…
19. Aw, man…
20. Too slow!
21. Looks like we’ve got company.
22. Yeah, you better run!
23. Is that all you’ve got?
24. This looks bad.
25. That was tough…
26. Power up!
27. Charging up!
28. Ready!
29. Power on!
30. Dammit!
31. Come on!
32. Too easy!
33. Hang in there!
34. Okay!
35. Level up!
36. I won’t fail!
37. Prepare yourself!
38. Sorry!
39. Now!
40. I win!
41. Let’s do this!
42. How… Can this…?
43. It’s not over…!
44. Look out!
45. Nice try.
46. Fire!
47. Mission complete!
48. Enough!
49. My turn!
50. What!?

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
